thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Putin orders humanitarian corridor in Syria's eastern Ghouta - agencies

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Putin orders humanitarian corridor in Syria's eastern Ghouta - agencies
text:
MOSCOW, Feb 26 (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin has ordered the implementation of a daily ceasefire in Syria’s eastern Ghouta, starting on Tuesday, and the creation of a “humanitarian corridor” via which civilians can leave, his defence minister was Quote: d as saying.
The minister, Sergei Shoigu, said the ceasefire would run from 09:00 until 14:00 local time daily, RIA news agency reported. He said details on the location of the corridor would be released soon. (Reporting by Polina Ivanova; Writing by Polina Nikolskaya; Editing by Christian Lowe)
